{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Used to trick the imps in [Arkemyr's Manor](/arkemyrsManor/) into thinking you're their master.
* [Worthless Idiot](/worthlessIdiot/) in [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/) mistakes you for Arkemyr when you first talk to him while wearing the robes.
* {{fs}} Wearing it while talking to [Fetid Spray](/fetidSpray/) yields unique dialogue.
* {{fs}} You can give it to [Drowsy Puke](/drowsyPuke/) to help him stage an imp uprising.
